response.overview: After escaping from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Leena Klammer travels to America by impersonating Esther, the missing daughter of a wealthy family. But when her mask starts to slip, she is put against a mother who will protect her family from the murderous “child” at any cost.
response.tagline: There's always been something wrong with Esther.
response.title: Orphan: First Kill

titles.title: オーファン：ファースト・キル
